languages.text: "Благой код, голосовой рецептор!" {n}Паскаль извергает череду бинарных сигналов и несколько секунд хранит молчание.{/n} "Выдвигаю гипотезу о неполадке в анализаторном блоке. Присутствует реакция на сигнал, отсутствует обработанный отклик... допустимо временно пренебречь".

"Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."
languages.original_text: "Благой код, голосовой рецептор!" {n}Паскаль извергает череду бинарных сигналов и несколько секунд хранит молчание.{/n} "Выдвигаю гипотезу о неполадке в анализаторном блоке. Присутствует реакция на сигнал, отсутствует обработанный отклик... допустимо временно пренебречь".

traits.locale_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

"Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

"Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

"Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

languages.text: “仁慈的代码啊！是语音接收器！”{n}帕斯卡发出了一连串二进制信号，之后沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“我推测，缺陷位于分析器模块中。我可以接收到信号产生的反应，但这些反应却并没有经过处理……允许进行暂时覆盖。”
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: “仁慈的代码啊！是语音接收器！”{n}帕斯卡发出了一连串二进制信号，之后沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“我推测，缺陷位于分析器模块中。我可以接收到信号产生的反应，但这些反应却并没有经过处理……允许进行暂时覆盖。”

languages.text: 「慈悲深きコードよ、ボイスレセプター！」{n}パスカルはニ進数信号を連続して発し、その後数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「不具合はアナライザーブロックにあると思われます。信号に対する反応はありますが、それが処理された反応がありません…一時的なオーバーライドは許されるはずです」
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲深きコード、そしてボイスレセプター！」{n}パスカルはニ進数信号を連続して発し、その後数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「不具合はアナライザーブロックにあると思われます。信号に対する反応はありますが、それが処理された反応がありません…一時的なオーバーライドは許されるでしょう」
「慈悲深きコードよ、ボイスレセプター！」{n}パスカルはニ進数信号を連続して発し、その後数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「不具合はアナライザーブロックにあると思われます。信号に対する反応はありますが、それが処理された反応がありません…一時的なオーバーライドは許されるはずです」

languages.text: "Wohlgesonnener Code, ein Stimmenrezeptor!" {n}Pasqal lässt eine Sequenz von binhärischen Signalen erklingen und schweigt dann einige Sekunden.{/n} "Ich vermute, dass sich der Defekt im Analysatorblock befindet. Ich registriere eine Reaktion auf das Signal, aber keine verarbeitete Antwort ... Ein vorübergehender Override ist zulässig."
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: "Wohlgesonnener Code, ein Stimmenrezeptor!" {n}Pasqal lässt eine Sequenz von binhärischen Signalen erklingen und schweigt dann einige Sekunden.{/n} "Ich vermute, dass sich der Defekt im Analysatorblock befindet. Ich registriere eine Reaktion auf das Signal, aber keine verarbeitete Antwort ... Ein vorübergehender Override ist zulässig."

languages.text: « Par le code bienveillant, un récepteur vocal ! » {n}Pasqal émet une séquence de signaux binhaires, puis garde le silence plusieurs secondes.{/n} « D'après moi, le dysfonctionnement se trouve dans le bloc analytique. J'enregistre une réaction au signal, mais pas de réponse émise... Une neutralisation temporaire est possible. »
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: « Par le code bienveillant, un récepteur vocal ! » {n}Pasqal émet une séquence de signaux binhaires, puis garde le silence plusieurs secondes.{/n} « D'après moi, le dysfonctionnement se trouve dans le bloc analytique. J'enregistre une réaction au signal, mais pas de réponse émise... Une neutralisation temporaire est possible. »

languages.text: «¡Buen código, un receptor de voz!». {n}Pasqal emite una secuencia de señales binarios y después espera unos segundos en silencio.{/n} «Mi hipótesis es que el defecto se encuentra en el bloque analítico. Registro una reacción a la señal, pero no procesa ninguna respuesta... Una anulación temporal sería aceptable».
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: «¡Buen código, un receptor de voz!». {n}Pasqal emite una secuencia de señales binarios y después espera unos segundos en silencio.{/n} «Mi hipótesis es que el defecto se encuentra en el bloque analítico. Registro una reacción a la señal, pero no procesa ninguna respuesta... Una anulación temporal sería aceptable».

languages.text: "Hayırlı kod, bir ses alıcısı!" {n}Pasqal bir dizi ikilidil sinyal çıkarıyor ve ardından birkaç saniye sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Hipotezime göre sorun, analizci blokunda. Sinyale bir tepki kaydettim ancak işlenmiş bir yanıt yok. Geçici bir geçersiz kılmaya müsaade edilebilir."
languages.original_text: "Benevolent code, a voice receptor!" {n}Pasqal emits a sequence of binharic signals and then is silent for several seconds.{/n} "I hypothesise that the defect is located in the analyser block. I register a reaction to the signal, but no processed response... A temporary override is permissible."

traits.locale_text: "Yüce kod, bir ses alıcısı!" {n}Pasqal bir dizi ikilidil sinyal mırıldanıyor ve ardından birkaç saniye sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Hipotezime göre sorun, analiz blokunda. Sinyale bir tepki kaydettim ancak işleyen bir yanıt yok. Geçici bir devre dışı bırakılmaya izin verilebilir."
